name: Plugin Name:  Sovratec Case Management
author: Sovratec

sections.description:
This plugin allows wordpress website to track and manage requests

Key Features

The plugin is packaged with the following features:

  • Users initiate case menagement by submitting requests.
  • requests go through workflow with each request assigned to right personnel
  • Each step is tracked with date is recorded. The plugin user perspective and admin perspective.
  • User will receive notification email when request is completed.
  • Website admin is able to assign request to right personnel based on case type

Need Support? We Got Your Back

All of our plugins come with free support. We care about your plugin after purchase just as much as you do.
We want to make your life easier and make you happy about choosing our plugins. We guarantee to respond to every inquiry within 1 business day.
Please visit our plugin page and ask us anything you need.

Additional Resources

  • Check out our other WooCommerce plugins.
sections.installation:
Install and activate the plugin.
After installation, Case Management displays on the right hand. Thatâ€™s the link for website admin.
For your regular users, once they log in, Case Management link will be in their account view.
